entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 10:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 8:58 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:58 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:58 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
